text: Saint-Pierre-sur-Orthe is a former commune of 531 people (1999). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2021, it was merged into the new commune of Vimartin-sur- Orthe. == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Saint-Pierre-sur-Orthe
